body_html: @mrry, my %PATH% includes the directory I extracted my cuDNN download into (it contains nothing but the cuda folder at the root of the archive). Going to try that soon.

body: @mrry, my `%PATH%` includes the directory I extracted my cuDNN download into (it contains nothing but the `cuda` folder at the root of the archive). I have also tried changing `%PATH%` to be this `cuda` subdirectory, but this produced the same result. Do I need to go even further and add the `cuda\bin` subdirectory because that's what the DLL is in? Going to try that soon.
